findings.title: Tests could not be run
findings.description: The test isn’t able to run because of the missing mock-file: "mocks/SDAOBondedTokenStake.sol".

findings.title: No events on contract modifications.
findings.description: The smart contract does not emit events when it undergoes modifications.

findings.title: A public function that could be declared external.
findings.description: public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas
